title: Paddy Livingston T207 (A on shirt version)
author: Vintagecatcher

posts.post_title: Paddy Livingston T207 (A on shirt version)
posts.post_content:
Recently acquired a Large C Livingston T207 to go with my Small C Livingston T207, so I figured I might as well go for the trifecta and purchase the A on shirt Livingston T207.

Looking to an vg/ex or better front without creases or wrinkles.

Send scans and price to:

[url]vintagecatcher@myfairpoint.net[/url]

Thanks,

Patrick
